GamesSection.title: Getting ready for something new! 🏗️
GamesSection.intro: This is a business for my self-realization. Rather than immediate monetary gain, I see it as a process to build my game world in the future. Here are the features of the game I want to create!

web3.title: Web3 technology
web3.description: I'm thinking of minting an NFT that can represent a brand of my own.

realtime.title: Play in real-time
realtime.description: Even if it's a simple game, I'd like to create a game that everyone can play in real time.

share.title: Shareable things
share.description: I want to make the things can be enjoyed with just one link (URL) without having to install.

PencilPickerSection.title: Pencil Picker is just came out! 🎮
PencilPickerSection.intro: Pencil Picker, which is Dante Games' first game, have developing with thoughtfulness to be simple enough for anyone to enjoy, yet not become boring. Stay tune with me!

NewsletterSection.heading: Would you like to get updates?
NewsletterSection.subHeading: When there are new games or updates, we'll notify you via email.
NewsletterSection.notificationCheckEmail: I just sent you a verification email. Please check it and click on the verification button! 😁
NewsletterSection.emailErrorMessage: This isn't a valid email format!
